STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_MONITOR_STATE_TEST
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE TEST_CONSOLE SET FLG1 = ? WHERE ID = ?

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_CHECK_STATE_TEST
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE TEST_CONSOLE SET FLG6 = ? WHERE ID = ?

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_ERROR_STATE_TEST
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE TEST_CONSOLE SET FLG3 = ? WHERE ID = ?

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_ALARM_STATE_TEST
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE TEST_CONSOLE SET FLG5 = ? WHERE ID = ?

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_ALL_ERRORS_STATE_TEST
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE TEST_CONSOLE SET FLG3 = ?, COLUMN3 = ? WHERE FLG2 = 1 AND COLUMN1 like ? and COLUMN2 like ?

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_ALL_ALARMS_STATE_TEST
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE TEST_CONSOLE SET FLG5 = ?, COLUMN3 = ? WHERE FLG4 = 1 AND COLUMN1 like ? and COLUMN2 like ?

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_ALL_VIEWING_STATE_TEST
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE TEST_CONSOLE SET FLG6 = ?, COLUMN3 = ? WHERE COLUMN1 like ? and COLUMN2 like ?

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_ALL_VIEWING_STATE_TEST_BY_CHECK
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE TEST_CONSOLE SET FLG8 = 0, COLUMN3 = ? WHERE ID IN ($)
